Root.Examples:
!calc (2+2) - (3-1) * 5
!calc 22/7
!calc log(100)^2
!calc root(64) mod 3
!calc not(true or false)
!calc 6 | 1
!calc expi
!calc 2E-4 + 1E3
!calc floor(5.5)
!calc 2*3 ; 3*2

The command supports: * Addition (+) * Subtraction (-) * Multiplication (* or x) * Division (/) * Power (^ or ** or xx) * Natural log (log) * Square root (root sqr sqrt) * Modulus/Remainder operation (% or mod) * Basic Trigonometry (sin cos tan atan) * Logic and Bit-wise (and or not, & | Â¬, < > = ==) * Constants (e c pi infinity) * Scientific notation (e.g. 2E-10) * Other functions (abs, fix, floor) * Splitting of statements using ;
